thread.title: Profit Margins Take Spotlight in U.S. Earnings Season
thread.title_full: Profit Margins Take Spotlight in U.S. Earnings Season - WSJ

author: Saumya Vaishampayan
title: Profit Margins Take Spotlight in U.S. Earnings Season
text:
As third-quarter U.S. corporate results roll out this week, many investors are putting an increased focus on profit margins as a sign of companiesâ€™ ability to propel earnings higher.
Profit margins, or earnings as a share of revenue, hit a record 10.5% for the S&P 500 in the second quarter. Margins have expanded since the financial crisis as companies cut costs, held off on updating infrastructure and borrowed at historically low... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
